N = int(input())

count = 0
for i in range(1, N+1):
    count += len(str(i)) % 2

print(count)

N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

for i in range(M):
    B, C = map(int, input().split())
    for j in range(B):
        A.append(C)
    A.sort(reverse=True)
    print(A)

N = int(input())

odd_count = 0
for i in range(1, N + 1):
    if len(str(i)) % 2 == 1:
        odd_count += 1

print(odd_count)

odd_count = 0
for i in range(1, N + 1):  # i は 1 から N までの整数
    if len(str(i)) % 2 == 1:  # i の桁数が奇数なら
        odd_count += 1

print(odd_count)
